author: craigmcc
msg: Add jndi.jar to the compile classpath as needed to build Tomcat 4 on JDK
1.2 systems.  This was not a problem on JDK 1.3, because the JNDI classes
have been integrated into the core JVM.

author: remm
msg: - A 206 returned an incorrect content length, instead of the actual number of bytes
